cmp: 化 (to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform)
匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
华 ((abbreviation for) China/(surname) Hua/magnificent/splendid/flowery, (surname)/name of a mountain)

exm.mng: He Houhua (1955-), Macau financier and politician, first magistrate from 1999
